plot.description: Plot object to be placed, defined by theoutput of a plotgardener plotting function

x.description: A numeric or unit object specifying plot x-location

y.description: A numeric, unit object, or character containing a "b" combinedwith a numeric value specifying plot y-location

width.description: A numeric or unit object specifying plot width

height.description: A numeric or unit object specifying plot height

just.description: Justification of plot relative to its (x, y) location

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x}, \code{y}, \code{width}, or \code{height} are onlygiven as numerics

draw.description: A logical value indicating whether graphics outputshould be produced

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
